abstract: The XM SkyDock connects to an iPhone or iPod Touch, but users will also need a subscription to Sirius XM Radio.
snippet: The XM SkyDock connects to an iPhone or iPod Touch, but users will also need a subscription to Sirius XM Radio.
lead_paragraph: Sirius XM Radio, always on the lookout for ways to attract fee-paying younger subscribers, is now after the Apple crowd.

headline.main: A Satellite Radio Receiver That Works With the iPhone
headline.print_headline: A Satellite Radio Receiver That Works With the iPhone
